ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
CodeDisplayDefinition
HIV.D.DE53No prior ARTAntiretroviral (ARV) drugs received prior to enrolment - No prior ART
HIV.D.DE54Received ARVs prior without records/documentationAntiretroviral (ARV) drugs received prior to enrolment - Received ARVs prior without records/documentation
HIV.D.DE55Received ARVs during pregnancy or breastfeedingAntiretroviral (ARV) drugs received prior to enrolment - Received ARVs during pregnancy or breastfeeding
HIV.D.DE56Received ARVs for PEP or PrEPAntiretroviral (ARV) drugs received prior to enrolment - Received ARVs for PEP or PrEP
HIV.D.DE57ARV prophylaxis for an HIV-exposed infantAntiretroviral (ARV) drugs received prior to enrolment - ARV prophylaxis for an HIV-exposed infant

title.value: Antiretroviral (ARV) drugs received prior to enrolment Codes

description.value: Codes representing possible values for the Antiretroviral (ARV) drugs received prior to enrolment element

display.value: Received ARVs during pregnancy or breastfeeding
Received ARVs for PEP or PrEP
ARV prophylaxis for an HIV-exposed infant
